tls:srcline.title: 鎮州臨濟慧照禪師語錄

tls:line.title: 鎮州臨濟慧照禪師語錄 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: then you'd be the kind of person who has nothing to do for the rest of his life

sense.def: (the person) without anything particular to do, who does not engage in any artificial activity; in the Chan BUDDH context referring to the enlightened person who does not engage deliberately in any activity but rather perfectly responds to and mirrors his environment at any given moment; it is a key term in the teaching of the 臨濟錄
